title: Related rates involving a sphere part - a

content.description: The radius r of a sphere is increasing at a constant rate of 0.04 centimeters per second. (Note: The volume of a sphere with radius r is V=4/3Ï€r3 .)
content.question: At the time when the radius of the sphere is 10 centimeters, what is the rate of increase of its volume?

frqParts.text: At the time when the radius of the sphere is 10 centimeters, what is the rate of increase of its volume?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
